Mobile App for apartment renters

Mobile application built with help of Cordova, Vue.js and Quasar Framework

Check Github

About this project

Project developed as a contructor with the Smart Gyrus web agency. It is a mobile app with its own design which serves housing payments for apartment renters.

At this project I worked as a Front End Developer. I was responsible for building markup form scratch, developing JavaScript functionality, working with API

Used technologies

  • Vue.js
  • JavaScript ES6
  • Quasar Framework
  • Cordova
  • Webpack
  • CSS3 + LESS
